data.description: Developing strategies for teaching young children. Relationships between development and culture, play, the variety of teachers' roles in learning, the functions of observation and assessment, developmentally appropriate practices, engaging children in their own learning, and constructing a curriculum unit.
data.title: METHODS, MATERIALS AND ACTIVITIES IN EARLY CHILDHOOD EDUCATION

data.description: Observation and participation in a classroom setting. Reserve two mornings, two afternoons, or one full day.
data.title: PRACTICUM IN EARLY CHILDHOOD EDUCATION IN KINDERGARTEN
